snippet.title: Centum - Official Announcement Trailer | ID@Xbox April 2024
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the twisted world of Centum in this unsettling announcement trailer for the upcoming unreliable narrative-driven puzzle horror game. Centum will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Steam, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch in summer 2024.

In Centum, players find themselves in a mysterious world where reality is as fluid as the mind of its narrator. Presented as a long-lost game never released, Centum challenges players to navigate through a series of perplexing scenarios, each shrouded in uncertainty and enigma.

As the story unfolds, players find themselves trapped within the confines of a cell, tasked with escaping within 100 days. But is it really the goal? With every click and decision remembered, even after restarting, players must grapple with the unreliable nature of the narrator's hints and guidance.

#IGN #Xbox
